thread.title: All civil servants paid following payroll system upgrade - Goundar
thread.title_full: All civil servants paid following payroll system upgrade - Goundar

author: fijivillage
title: All civil servants paid following payroll system upgrade - Goundar
text:
All civil servants have been paid, with the majority receiving their payments yesterday afternoon and the remainder today.
This has been confirmed by the Permanent Secretary for Finance, Shiri Goundar, who says they successfully migrated to the new payroll system yesterday, and no further issues are expected for future payments.
Concerns had been raised by civil servants, with some suggesting that remaining government workers would receive their pay by next Tuesday.
Goundar clarified that all processing was completed yesterday as per the pay calendar.
Stay tuned for the latest news on our radio stations
topics: Economy, Business and Finance->financial and economic news
